name: Just Don't Fall (Tripti)
description:
One goal: Get to the top. Sounds easy enough doesn't it? Guess again.

This is just a fun sideproject and you really shouldn't expect too much, that being said, I hope you like it. :)

NB! Just Don't Fall is made for PS4 controllers and is not designed with other forms of input in mind. Playing with a keyboard and mouse is possible but EXTREMELY hard.
